raw: {"communication_strategy":120,"employee_engagement":115,"adaptability":110,"overall_score":115,"comments":"The CEO communicates change initiatives clearly and strategically, ensuring stakeholders understand the reasons and benefits. They engage employees effectively, fostering buy-in and minimizing resistance. Their adaptability is evident in providing support and monitoring progress with flexibility. Overall, their performance indicates strong leadership in managing organizational change."}
comments: The CEO communicates change initiatives clearly and strategically, ensuring stakeholders understand the reasons and benefits. They engage employees effectively, fostering buy-in and minimizing resistance. Their adaptability is evident in providing support and monitoring progress with flexibility. Overall, their performance indicates strong leadership in managing organizational change.
